## Demo: Individual variation

This is a **Demo** for individual variation field map and reliability 
see Ref <http://JAMA-paper-link.com>

```{r load}
load('data/Demo_ToyData1.RData')
nsubj <- 10
nsession <- 2
```

## Plot the individual distance matrix

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r distance_matrix, echo=FALSE}
d <- dist(df[,3:102], diag=TRUE, upper=TRUE)
d <- array(matrix(as.matrix(d)), dim=c(nsubj*nsession, nsubj*nsession))
p <- distance_plot(d,'')
p
```
```{r variation_field, echo=FALSE}
d <- dist(df[,3:102], diag=TRUE, upper=TRUE)
d <- array(matrix(as.matrix(d)), dim=c(nsubj*nsession, nsubj*nsession))
p <- distance_plot(d,'')
p
```
